‚ú¶ THE YEAR IN NEAR 2025 ‚ú¶

2025 was the year NEAR crossed into real-world scale.

1M transactions per second.
$7B+ in cross-chain volume.
And more, live on mainnet.

Here‚Äôs what NEAR shipped in 2025 üßµ 
NEAR achieved 1M TPS in a benchmark using real core code, consumer-grade hardware, and publicly verifiable scripts.

This milestone demonstrates that sharded infrastructure can scale horizontally for high-load dApps and well beyond the throughput of traditional payment networks. 
NEAR scaled from 6 to 9 shards on mainnet, increasing network throughput by 50%. More shards mean more headroom for execution-layer growth across Intents.

With resharding successfully implemented, NEAR has a straightforward pathway for adding more shards and scaling capacity. 
With the launch of 600 millisecond block time, NEAR has introduced a new benchmark for high-performance blockchains. 

This upgrade reduced latency by 2x to ensure higher-frequency processing for apps that require near real-time speed. 
NEAR now offers 1.2-second finality, making it one of the fastest settlement layers in the industry.

1.2s finality drastically reduces complexity for developers and end users around transaction confirmations and provides confidence in execution. 
NEAR Intents is the fastest-growing cross-chain infrastructure, enabling one-click swaps, unified liquidity, and universal execution across the multi-chain DeFi economy.

With Intents, any pair is NEAR. 
NEAR Intents surpassed $7B in all-time cross-chain volume.

Intents‚Äô steadily growing volume demonstrates that cross-chain demand is converging around low-cost and unified liquidity rather than isolated bridges and centralized providers. 
With 13M+ total swaps, NEAR Intents has become the widely adopted execution layer for traders, wallets, and arbitrage systems.

Intents‚Äô architecture removes the complexity for users traditionally associated with cross-chain execution, replacing it with a single, simple intent. 
NEAR Intents now supports more than 125 assets, enabling composability across DeFi markets and empowering developers to build chain-agnostic applications without fragmentation. 
NEAR Intents now connects 25+ major blockchains, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, Zcash, and others, providing expansive cross-chain coverage. 

Across the multi-chain ecosystem, NEAR Intents now supports over 1.6M unique users. 
The launch of NEAR AI Cloud and Private Chat introduced the category of privacy-first intelligence for both enterprises and consumers.

Devs can now deploy models that keep user data encrypted end-to-end, solving one of the most significant challenges in enterprise AI adoption. 
NEAR AI is now supporting deployments serving 100M+ users through integrations with @BraveNightly, @openmind_agi, and the nextgen travel management platform TravAI, which also leverages NEAR Intents.

These integrations demonstrate the growing demand for verifiable AI execution. 
SovereignAI (Nasdaq: SVRN) launched with a NEAR-based digital asset treasury, following its $120M PIPE investment. 

@svrn_ai marks one of the most notable examples of institutional adoption of NEAR-powered AI infrastructure to date. 
House of Stake went live as NEAR‚Äôs decentralized governance body to strengthen community-driven decision-making and align long-term incentives across the ecosystem.

The NEAR community has already successfully passed several binding Decision proposals through House of Stake. 
NEAR completed its Halving Upgrade, reducing maximum annual inflation by 50%.

The halving establishes a more sustainable tokenomics framework and supports incentive alignment across the ecosystem during the protocol‚Äôs next growth phase of productization and real-world usage. 
What NEAR shipped this year sets the foundation for scaling volume and ecosystem-wide economic alignment in 2026.

Read the full 2025 recap and 2026 outlook below: https://www.near.org/blog/near-2025-milestones

‚ö†Ô∏è Former Pump fun Developer Jarett Dunn Sentenced to 6 Years in Prison    British court has delivered a strong verdict: Ex-senior developer Jarett Dunn, widely known online as @STACCoverflow, received two concurrent six-year prison sentences for insider fraud involving approximately $2 million stolen from Pump fun.    Full Incident Timeline   ‚Äî May 2024: Dunn joined Pump fun and gained privileged access   ‚Äî After just six weeks, he exploited his private key to execute a flash loan drain   ‚Äî Stole funds equivalent to ~$2M in $SOL  at the time   ‚Äî Instead of keeping the proceeds, he airdropped them to thousands of random wallets   ‚Äî Targeted holders of specific memecoin collections in a self-styled "Robin Hood" act    Public Confession and Fallout   ‚Äî Dunn openly admitted the exploit on social media in dramatic posts   ‚Äî Declared: "everybody be cool, this is a robbery" and framed it as stopping "evil"   ‚Äî Gained massive attention and nearly 30,000 followers overnight   ‚Äî Some praised the chaotic redistribution, while most condemned it as theft    Legal Proceedings   ‚Äî Arrested and charged with fraud by abuse of position   ‚Äî Additional count for transfer of criminal property   ‚Äî Pleaded guilty after initial delays and bail violations   ‚Äî Sentenced on December 18, 2025, to two concurrent 6-year terms    Broader Implications   ‚Äî Exposes critical insider risks in fast-growing crypto projects   ‚Äî Demonstrates that even decentralized spaces face real-world legal accountability   ‚Äî Serves as a cautionary tale for teams to implement stricter access controls   ‚Äî Reinforces the need for audits and multi-layered security in protocols    This case marks a significant moment for accountability in the Solana ecosystem and beyond.    Not financial advice. DYOR.   #SOL  #Crypto  #Security  #PumpFun  #Fraud

Forward Industries Tokenizes FWDI Stock on Solana    Forward Industries launched tokenized shares of its stock Thursday through Superstate's Opening Bell platform, marking the first public company equity usable directly in #DeFi  protocols. The Solana treasury firm holds approximately 6.8 million $SOL  tokens worth around $832 million in net asset value.   The company's #SEC -registered shares now exist on the #Solana  blockchain as SPL tokens available for integration across the network's decentralized finance landscape. Forward initially announced plans to tokenize its then-named FORD stock in September but changed the ticker to FWDI due to confusion with the automotive manufacturer.   Galaxy Digital, Jump Crypto, and Multicoin Capital backed Forward's transformation into the largest $SOL  digital asset treasury. The firm's holdings exceed the combined total of the next three largest SOL treasuries, according to The Block's data tracking digital asset treasury companies.   Opening Bell enables companies to issue non-synthetic shares directly on blockchain networks using SPL token standards on Solana and ERC-20 tokens on #Ethereum . The platform launched in May 2025 and facilitates direct tokenization rather than wrapped tokens or synthetic derivatives.   Forward highlighted a specific use case where tokenized FWDI serves as collateral on lending protocol Kamino, allowing users to borrow #stablecoins  against their holdings. Pyth's real-time price feeds support the integration, creating what Forward describes as the first regulated public equity functioning as collateral in a live DeFi market.   Kyle Samani, Multicoin Capital founder and Forward chairman, stated the tokenized shares unlock a bridge between traditional markets and programmable financial systems defining the digital economy. Superstate's transfer agent holds the tokenized shares under its name while tracking ownership across the non-custodial DeFi landscape.
